cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IR, cs.RO. 

The paper proposes a method for optimizing prediction problems with submodular reward functions, which is a common problem in machine learning and optimization. The paper specifically mentions applications such as ad placement, recommendation, trajectory prediction, and document summarization, which are all areas that fall under the umbrella of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The method proposed in the paper is based on no-regret learning, which is a well-established technique in machine learning and optimization. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also mentions applications in information retrieval (IR) and robotics (RO), which are also possible sub-categories.
